source.25221568:
def plot_waves(sample: np.ndarray) -> None:
    # sns.set(style="ticks", context="notebook", palette="pastel")
    plt.style.use("seaborn-muted")
    _ = plt.plot(sample[0])
    _ = plt.plot(sample[1])
    _ = plt.plot(sample[2])
source.255cc057:
pos_df = train_df[train_df.target==1].iloc[0]
neg_df = train_df[train_df.target==0].iloc[0]

pos_wav = np.load(pos_df.filepath)
plot_waves(pos_wav)
plt.show()
neg_wav = np.load(neg_df.filepath)
plot_waves(neg_wav)
